HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Za narudžbe u iznosu od 60,00 € (452,07 kn) ili više, dostava je besplatna.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke može potrajati duže od navedenog roka.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Trošak dostave za glomazne artikle (npr. bicikli, fitness oprema) iznosi 29,99 € (225,96 kn) po artiklu.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Besplatna dostava ne vrijedi za glomazne artikle.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke može potrajati duže od navedenog roka.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Dostupno u svim Hervis trgovinama u Hrvatskoj.

weekend_delivery.days: Ovisno o radnom vremenu odabrane trgovine.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Hervis.hr offers standard home delivery, home delivery for bulky items, and in-store pickup (Click & Collect). Delivery to parcel shops or parcel lockers is not available.
PROVIDERS: The exclusive delivery partner for all home deliveries is GLS.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs 4,99 € and is free for orders over 60,00 €. Bulky item delivery has a fixed fee of 29,99 € per item, with no free shipping option. In-store pickup is free. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 1,50 € applies to home deliveries.
DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery takes 2-5 business days, while bulky items take 3-7 business days. Delivery to Croatian islands may experience delays. Express and weekend delivery services are not offered for home delivery.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The primary delivery options are straightforward home delivery via GLS and a free Click & Collect service available at all their physical stores. There is a clear distinction and separate pricing for bulky goods.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clear and well-structured, typically found on a dedicated 'Dostava' (Delivery) page or within the 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja' (General Terms & Conditions). Key details like costs, delivery times, and provider are easy to find. The lack of parcel shop/locker options is a limitation compared to some competitors.
